questions.question_text: Which of the following statements are correct regarding application layer test commands? (Choose two.)

choices.A: They are used to filter real-time debugs.
choices.C: Some of them display statistics and configuration information about a feature or process.
choices.D: Some of them can be used to restart an application.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: CD
C and D
All answers are wrong. A certificate doesn't contain an 'Issued To' field. Right answer should be CN field or CN in the Subject field..

choices.D: FortiGate uses the requested URL from the user's web browser.
choices.C: FortiGate blocks the request without any further inspection.
choices.B: FortiGate switches to the full SSL inspection method to decrypt the data.
choices.A: FortiGate uses the Issued To: field in the server's certificate.

questions.question_text: When using the SSL certificate inspection method for HTTPS traffic, how does FortiGate filter web requests when the browser client does not provide the server name indication (SNI)?

discussion.content:
B, C & D don't exist.
A is correct.

questions.question_text: What global configuration setting changes the behavior for content-inspected traffic while FortiGate is in system conserve mode?

discussion.content:
C & D dont exist. auto-discovery-forwarder specifically deals with shortcuts.
B is correct.

B is wrong. engine-count 0 spawns engines based upon system resources
C is wrong because fail-open is disabled
D is wrong because nothing references "more than 4 GB memory"
A must be the answer.

choices.D: IPS will use the faster matching algorithm which is only available for units with more than 4 GB memory.
choices.B: FortiGate will spawn IPS engine instances based on the system load.
choices.A: IPS will scan every byte in every session.
choices.C: New packets will be passed through without inspection if the IPS socket buffer runs out of memory.
